hints: Nationalities are not capitalized as adjectives
Time first, then verb, then subject (inversion)

sentences.english: How many children do you have?
The book is in the bag
sentences.german: Das Buch ist in der Tasche

sentences.english: The cat is in the garden
The dog is from the shelter
sentences.german: Der Hund ist aus dem Tierheim

sentences.english: The children are in the room
Every July we go to the beach
sentences.german: Jeden Juli fahren wir zum Strand
Der Zug fährt um zehn ab

sentences.english: You all would like to help
